sen.j: 京都市の左京区にある地名。
sen.e: Kurama is a name of place located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Kurama is a name of a place located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.
Kurama is a name of a place located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 鞍馬山 - 京都市の北西部にある山。
sen.e: Kurama-yama Mountain is a mountain located in the northwestern part of Kyoto City.
Kurama-yama Mountain is a mountain located in the northwestern part of Kyoto City.
Mt. Kurama is a mountain located in the northwestern part of Kyoto City.

sen.j: 鞍馬街道 - 京都府道38号京都広河原美山線の別名。
sen.e: Kurama Kaido Road is another name of Kyoto-Hirogawa-Miyama Line of Kyoto Prefectural Road No. 38.
Kurama Kaido Road is another name of Kyoto-Hirogawa-Miyama Line of Kyoto Prefectural Road No. 38.
Kurama Kaido Road is another name of Kyoto-Hirogawara-Miyama Line of Kyoto Prefectural Route 38.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。Prefectural Route としました。

sen.j: 鞍馬線 - 叡山電鉄の鉄道路線。
sen.e: Kurama Line is a railway line operated Eizan-dentetsu (Eizan Electric Railway).
Kurama Line is a railway line operated by Eizan-dentetsu (Eizan Electric Railway).
Kurama Line is a railway line operated by Eizan Electric Railway.
sen.cmt: Eizan Electric Railway としました。

sen.j: 鞍馬駅 - 京都府京都市左京区鞍馬本町にある叡山電鉄鞍馬線の駅。
sen.e: Kurama Station is a station on the Kurama Line of Eizan-dentetsu, which is located in Kurama Honmachi, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kurama Station is a station on the Kurama Line of Eizan-dentetsu, which is located in Kurama Honmachi, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kurama Station is a station on the Kurama Line of Eizan Electric Railway, which is located in Kurama Honmachi, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: Eizan Electric Railway としました。

sen.j: 鞍馬寺 - 京都府京都市左京区鞍馬本町にある寺院。
sen.e: Kurama-dera Temple is a temple located in Kurama Honmachi, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kurama-dera Temple is a temple located in Kurama Honmachi, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kurama-dera Temple is a temple located in Kurama Honmachi, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 鞍馬天狗 - 大佛次郎作の時代小説およびそれを原作とした映画。
sen.e: Kurama-tengu is a name of historical novel written by Jiro OSARAGI, and also a name of movie made based on this novel.
Kurama-tengu is a name of a historical novel written by Jiro OSARAGI, and also the name of a movie made based on this novel.

sen.j: 大日本帝国海軍の艦艇名
sen.e: Name of ship belonging to the Japanese Imperial Navy
Name of a ship belonging to the Japanese Imperial Navy
Name of a ship belonging to the Japanese Imperial Navy

sen.j: 鞍馬 (巡洋戦艦) - 鞍馬型装甲巡洋艦（後に巡洋戦艦）の1番艦。
sen.e: Kurama (battlecruiser) is the No. 1 warship of Kurama class armored battlecruiser (battlecruiser subsequently).
Kurama (battlecruiser) was the No. 1 warship among Kurama class armored battlecruisers (battlecruiser subsequently).
Kurama (battlecruiser) was the No. 1 warship among Kurama class armored battlecruisers (battlecruiser subsequently).

sen.j: 鞍馬 (空母) -戦時建造補充計画上での雲龍 (空母)型空母の9番艦。
sen.e: Kurama (aircraft carrier) is the No. 9 warship of Unryu class aircraft carrier under the supplemental plan for construction during the war.
Kurama (aircraft carrier) was the No. 9 warship among Unryu class aircraft carriers created under the supplemental plan for construction during the war.

sen.j: あん馬 - 体操競技の種目及びそれに使用するスポーツ器具。
sen.e: Anba is one of gymnastics, and a gymnastics apparatus used for it.

sen.e: Anba is a part of gynmnastics - and an apparatus used in the sport.
